itemDisplayName: Api management logs to moesif using Eventhub App Webjob
description: Analyze access logs from Azure API Management using Moesif API Analytics without any code changes or redeploy. View rejected requests that never reach your underlying service. Integrate using log-to-eventhub policy, Eventhub, Storage and App Service Webjob
summary: Send Api Management request/response to Moesif Api Analytics using log-to-eventhub api policy and App Service Webjob
